full_description:
Corsair XENEON 32UHD144-A 32 inch 4K UHD 144Hz IPS Gaming Monitor

The Corsair XENEON 32UHD144-A 4K Gaming Monitor comes with a rapid refresh rate of up to 144Hz and a response time of 1ms MPRT which gives you an unbelievable gaming experience through a vivid ultra-slim 32-inch IPS UHD (3840 x2160) display. For a greater viewing area to see every detail, a 32" IPS panel with 3840 x2160 offers a 40% larger screen than a 27". The refresh rate and response times of quick games must be fast as well. Motion blur or waiting for your next frame is never an issue with the XENEON 32UHD144-A fast IPS display. Milliseconds count during intense combat. Savor a seamless, uninterrupted immersion with a 144Hz refresh rate and blazingly fast 1ms MPRT. The XENEON 32UHD144-A 27-inch 4K monitor has 100% sRGB, 100% Adobe RGB, and 98% DCI-P3 color gamut coverage which made possible by quantum dot technology and a Fast IPS panel, which results in more vibrant, realistic colors. To enhance color accuracy and image quality, the LED backlight is filtered via millions of crystals of varying sizes using quantum dot technology. A fast-paced gaming session, color-accurate production work, or watching stunning HDR video all require a display that can keep up. With all the technology you require to remain at the forefront the XENEON 32UHD144-A has it all. Wide brightness ranges are provided by HDR600 displays, which enhance realism and provide stunning in-game graphics.

full_description:
Corsair XENEON 315QHD165 32" IPS QHD 165Hz Gaming Monitor

The Corsair XENEON 315QHD165 32" IPS QHD 165Hz Gaming Monitor is a premium display designed for gamers who want both high performance and great visual quality. This 32-inch monitor has a QHD resolution of 2560 x 1440, which provides astonishingly crisp and vivid visuals that improve the gaming experience. Its IPS panel ensures high color accuracy and consistency, making it perfect for gaming and content production. With a refresh rate of 165Hz, this XENEON 315QHD165 monitor delivers ultra-smooth animation, eliminating blur and tearing during fast-paced action sequences. The quick 1ms MPRT (Moving Picture Response Time) and less than 8ms GTG (Gray-to-Gray) response time improve responsiveness, guaranteeing that fast-moving pictures are displayed with clarity and precision. The XENEON 315QHD165 has two HDMI connections and one DisplayPort, providing flexible connecting choices for a variety of devices. It supports HDR10, which provides increased brightness and a broader color gamut for more vibrant and lifelike images. The display is AMD FreeSync Premium and NVIDIA G-Sync compatible, allowing for a tear-free gaming experience by syncing the XENEON 315QHD165 monitor's refresh rate with the graphics card's frame rate. Adaptive Sync Technology is included to reduce screen tearing and stuttering, resulting in a smooth and immersive gaming experience. The display has adjustable height, tilt, and swivel settings, allowing users to select their ideal viewing angle. The monitor is also VESA compliant with a 100mm x 100mm bracket, making it easy to place on a wall or an arm. The Corsair XENEON 315QHD165 32" IPS QHD 165Hz Gaming Monitor offers great performance, superb visual quality, and a wide range of functions, making it a perfect option for both gamers and content makers.
